dimensions: Overall: 457.2 x 76.2 cm (15 ft. x 30 in.)
title: Harlem Toile de Jouy
description: Based on a toile format this design contains landscape vignettes of stereotyped views of African-Americans and Harlem. The scenes include a couple dancing to a boom box, another couple eating fried chicken and watermelon in a picnic setting, and a group of girls playing "Double Dutch" with the jumprope. Printed in black and yellow on a white ground.
restrictions: Studio Printworks does not have copyright
name: Sidewall
